snippet: Safety concerns after the disaster at Fukushima Daiichi last year have led to a gradual shutdown of nearly all Japan’s nuclear reactors, prompting fears of power shortages.
lead_paragraph: Safety concerns after the disaster at Fukushima Daiichi last year have led to a gradual shutdown of nearly all Japan’s nuclear reactors, prompting fears of power shortages.

headline.seo: Japan Seeks to Restart Some Nuclear Reactors
headline.main: Japan Seeks to Restart Some Nuclear Power Plants
headline.print_headline: Japan Seeks to Restart Some Nuclear Power Plants
